title: Patch 5.7 Bugs Megathread
body:
Summoners,

We're here to respond to any issues that you have after this morning's update to patch 5.7. If you've encountered any issues since the patch, please post them here and we will investigate them. 

You may also want to check out the Reddit Megathread as well: 
http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/31uem1/patch_57_bugs_megathread/

replies.body:
{{champion:101}} Xerath's 1st R does not work.

Steps to re-produce:
1. As Xerath, spam R to fire your first shot quickly from a far distance
2. First shot doesn't work and is barely visible and deals NO dmg
3. Second and third shots work fine.

In effect, it makes it look like you shot only 2 barrages but from close inspection, the first shot deals no damage and the animation of it seems to be really sped up (can barely recognize a shot was made).

I've had the same problem... All three shots fire, but the first shot will fire directly on top of you, even though your cursor is nowhere near you. This doesn't happen every time, but more often than not. {{champion:101}} = {{item:3070}}

Is the right click to cancel skill range indicator an undocumented change or just a bug. Frustrating to move and cast when you keep cancelling your skill button presses. Could have sworn you had to hold left then right click to cancel.

This continued to happen throughout the game to the point where I wouldn't even leave the base to help my team due to the fear of my champion locking on to an enemy and not allowing me free movement unless I die.

Any ideas?

I know i'm pretty late on this thread, but i just had a pretty big problem while in champ select...

this should really be looked into, since if it happens to someone on promos AFAIK they will automatically lose a game which could cost them a lot.

*REPOST FROM NA BOARD- STILL RELEVANT*
Mac users on the most recent patch are experiencing a gamebreaking bug which causes them to go into permanent attack move. The reason that this is such a huge problem is that you can ONLY right click in game and once you go into range of an enemy unit, you will attack it and you will not be able to stop until the units within range are killed. This bug also causes almost all keys to not work in game. Some of the keys that do not work are: Left Click, Shop(button, you can still right click the shop but you will not be able to purchase anything), Scoreboard, Pings, Cannot level up skills, camera stuck in place (you can manually move your mouse to far left or right), all skills come off smartcast and go to regular cast, cannot recall, cannot click continue at end game (Victory/Defeat).

However, you can still chat and right click although it is still in attack move mode.

This bug makes the game unplayable for many mac users if they experience it. I would hope Riot would put up a notice on the client letting people know that they are aware of it and trying to fix it. If you need any other info please just ask, this bug makes the game unplayable for mac users.
